action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: Indigenous Peoples of the United States
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Klamath Tribe Judgment Fund Repeal Act
This bill repeals the Klamath Tribe Judgment Fund Act, which sets forth how funds credited to the Klamath Tribe must be distributed.
The Department of the Interior must disburse to the tribe the balance of funds that were appropriated or deposited into per capita trust accounts and trust accounts for remaining legal fees and administration.
